snippet.textDisplay:
@Jon VB

It's good though..

The olympics is just showing very clearly, everything wrong about the ccp~

From the fact that the whole olympics is literally being played in a big camp!

To the fact that they're cheating everytime they can..

To the fact that it's fake snow, and it should have been in kazakhstan..

To how paranoid they manage things, and their insane covid restrictions..

To how freaked out athletes are to speak..

To how nazi nationalistic they are becoming..

To how they won't let athletes playing for them use anything except chinese 🤷‍♂️ even if they can't..

To how hypocritical they are about who can have dual citizenship, when it serves them right~

To how purposefully they are using the olympics for political reasons.

To the fact that this guy we are talking to, literally joined in december 2019 (right after the pandemic started)..

Etc~

Good 👍

Let communists be communists..

snippet.textDisplay:
This race shouldn't have taken place anyway since Russia and the US were DQed for BS reasons and China lost to South Korea already but won because of a completely BS call after grabbing another player.
The most blatant cheat was against Canada where a Chinese skater grabbed a lane marker and slid it into their skates and the Canadian was DQed.

Free Taiwan.
snippet.textOriginal:
This race shouldn't have taken place anyway since Russia and the US were DQed for BS reasons and China lost to South Korea already but won because of a completely BS call after grabbing another player.

snippet.textDisplay: Your not helping your case by explaining how to cheat properly, 🤣

snippet.textDisplay:
Sure, but that doesn't mean we can allow players to grab eachother to fix such situations~

The judges should have just called out the first guy, and disqualified him after the fact..

You can't just allow players to grab eachother.. And judges are supposed to "judge" when people are playing unfair, to disqualify them..

Simple~

What Hungarian did, they do regularly on their highways. And what Chinese did - I am not even surprised..
